replies.author: 思念化作海
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 折叠 于 2020-4-22 12:20 编辑 

%server_time_<SimpleDateFormat>%
<SimpleDateFormat> 看这个链接来填
https://docs.oracle.com/javase/8 ... mpleDateFormat.html

试试%server_time_yyyy年MM月dd日HH时mm分%
需要安装变量拓展
https://api.extendedclip.com/expansions/server/
